text:
Accepting an offer outside academia as a research economist (BEA). :slightly_smiling_face: #PermanentJob
Do we have a community in the US Fed statistical system for using Julia at the federal government and such?

elements.text: Accepting an offer outside academia as a research economist (BEA).

#PermanentJob
Do we have a community in the US Fed statistical system for using Julia at the federal government and such?

text: I know Matt Helm who's active on Discourse works with the Census, I believe. I work for the government of California.

elements.text: I know Matt Helm who's active on Discourse works with the Census, I believe. I work for the government of California.

text: I think each year The Federal Reserve Bank of New York presents a talk or two at JuliaCon on "this is the R model that used to take 3 days to run and now runs in 2 minutes in Julia"
